## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Microbial Variant Calling](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/variant-analysis/tutorials/microbial-variants/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features
